nō mṛḍa-mṛḍa nō tayā̍-tayā̍ nō mṛḍa** nō mṛḍa-mṛḍa nō-nō mṛḍa jī̠vasē̎-jī̠vasē̎ mṛḍa nō-nō mṛḍa jī̠vasē̎** mṛḍa jī̠vasē̎-jī̠vasē̎ mṛḍa ** jī̠vasē̎** ** </ghana_padamu> <name>  drāpē̠ andha̍saspatē̠ dari̍dra̠nnīla</name> <order>33</order> <padamu display_value="Sri Rudram">a79e9faec327461049521d12b4013105</padamu> <padamustring>  drāpē̠ andha̍saspatē̠ dari̍dra̠nnīla̍lōhita । ē̠ṣā-mpuru̍ṣāṇāmē̠ṣā-mpa̍śū̠nā-mmā bhērmā-'rō̠ mō ē̍ṣā̠-ṅkiñcha̠nāma̍mat ।  yā tē̍ rudra śi̠vā ta̠nū-śśi̠vā vi̠śvāha̍bhēṣajī । śi̠vā ru̠drasya̍ bhēṣa̠jī tayā̍ nō mṛḍa jī̠vasē̎ </padamustring>
